Programming, coding or software development, means writing computer code to automate tasks.

patterns: What happens after entering wrong pin 3 times?
What if unlock pattern is wrong 3 times?
responses: If the pattern/pin is entered wrong 3 times, a photo and location are sent to two emergency numbers via SMS.

patterns: Can I save my messages and call logs?
What does the backup feature do?
responses: You can backup your contacts, SMS, and call logs in PDF format and share them via other apps.

patterns: How can I ring my phone remotely?
What is the ATMT ALT command?
responses: Send 'ATMT ALT' via SMS to your registered number to start the alarm. To stop it, send 'ATM ALTT', even if the phone is in silent mode.

patterns: How does female safety feature work?
What happens if I press power button five times?
responses: Pressing the power button five times will send a photo and location link to two emergency contacts via SMS.

patterns: What info does the home page show?
What is shown on the homepage?
What information is visible on home screen?
responses: The homepage updates your lock, unlock, restart, and shutdown activity with date and time.

patterns: If Accessibility Permission is Not Allow and error occurred to Turn off Accessive Ball Or Quick ball then.
If Accessibility is Automatically Off then.
responses: Ensure Accessibility Permission is enabled and disable Quick Ball or Assistive Touch if needed from settings.
Send 'ATMT WRAP' from your emergency number to reset your phone remotely.

patterns: Does the app clean junk files?
responses: The app clears app cache and junk files with one click to boost phone performance.
Send 'ATMT TRACK' from any number to your registered number to receive a photo from the front camera and location via SMS.
Send 'ATMT TRACKB' to your registered number to receive a photo from the back camera and location via SMS.

patterns: Tell me about ATMT PRO features
responses: ATMT PRO is an Android anti-theft service that helps track lost devices, remotely control phone functions, and includes features like SIM change alerts, screen lock, call forwarding status, USB alerts, and thief image capture.

patterns: What kind of data is stored?
responses: ATMT collects personal details during registration and uses cookies to improve user experience. We do not view or sell your backed-up data.

patterns: Is my data shared with others?
responses: Your data is used only to operate the service and for internal research. It’s not shared with third parties unless essential for recovery or technical support.

patterns: What are the rules for using ATMT?
Can I use ATMT for any purpose?
responses: You must not use ATMT for unlawful activities. Abuse, violations, or offensive behavior may lead to account termination.
You can reach support via WhatsApp at 7887881990 or email at atmtpro@gmail.com. Our team is ready to help!

patterns: How do I cancel my account?
Will I be charged after I cancel?
responses: You may cancel your account anytime by contacting support via email. All content will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. You won’t be charged further after cancellation.

patterns: Do I get notified of price updates?
Is there a price hike notice?
responses: ATMT may revise pricing or service features with a 30-day prior notice, typically published on our website.
ATMT PRO and its features are provided 'as is' without any express or implied warranties, including fitness for a particular purpose or uninterrupted availability.

patterns: Are you liable if something goes wrong?
What if I lose data using the service?
responses: ATMT is not liable for indirect or consequential damages. If the service is free, we assume no liability whatsoever. Use of the service is at your own risk.

patterns: What are the ATMT SOS features?
Can I lock my phone remotely?
responses: ATMT PRO offers features like motion and charger theft protection, ATMT LOCK for screen security, SIM change alerts, USB connection alerts, call forwarding status, and emergency SOS with contact routing.

patterns: Give me your contact number and email
Tell me how to reach ATMT
responses:
Here are our contact details:

Company: Aarush GOC Pvt Ltd, ATMT
Address: 301, 302, Siddhivinayak Home Apartment, Chapru Nagar Chowk, Near Dominos Pizza, next to Telephone Exchange Square, Nagpur-440008

Customer Care Number: +91 9560446447
Email: atmthub@gmail.com, sale@atmthub.com, services@atmthub.com
Working Hours: Monday to Saturday, 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM

patterns: If Accessibility Permission is Not Allow and error occurred to Turn off Accessive Ball Or Quick ball then.
Accessibility permission issue with quick ball
How do I enable accessibility permission?
responses:
To fix the accessibility permission error, follow these steps:
1. Go to your mobile settings and search for 'Quick Ball' or 'Accessive Ball'.
2. Turn OFF the Quick Ball or Accessive Ball.
3. After this, your accessibility permission should be allowed.

patterns: How to fix battery optimization permission issue?
App is restricted by battery settings
If Your Battery Optimization Permission Is Not Allowing In Mobile then.
responses: Go to the mobile settings and search for 'Battery & Performance'. Then go to Battery Saver settings → App Battery Saver → ATMT PRO → Select 'No Restriction'.

patterns: Why can't I enable device admin?
Device admin not working on my phone
If Your Device Admin App not Enable then.
responses: Please check if your phone is a Samsung Galaxy Knox device. Some Knox-enabled models do not allow device admin access.

patterns: I didn’t receive OTP after signup
OTP not coming during sign up
responses: Ensure you have active internet access. Try signing up again with a different email ID, and confirm your registered number is correct.

patterns: Why is my activation key not working?
responses: Check if you entered the activation code correctly. If the issue remains, contact support to verify your code.

patterns: Talkback is on how to turn off
responses: To turn off Talkback: Open Settings → Accessibility → Talkback → Turn Talkback OFF → Confirm with OK. Remember to double-click when Talkback is active.

patterns: Why won't my security number save?
If Security Contact Not Save or Update then.
responses: If security contacts aren't saving: 1. Check your internet connection/speed 2. Refresh your network 3. Try saving the numbers again.
Click 'Forgot password', enter your email-ID. An OTP will be sent to your registered number. Create and confirm a new password, then sign in again.

patterns: Where to find my registered email?
If You Forget email id then.
responses: To find your email: Open ATMT Pro → Go to Profile → Your email ID will be displayed there.

patterns: Lost my phone without emergency number
Forget your emergency no? If you lose your mobile? Don’t have emergency no with you? how to help yourself?
responses: If you've lost your phone without emergency numbers: 1. Visit https://www.atmthub.com/login 2. Enter your email-ID and password 3. Access your emergency contacts through the User Portal.

patterns: Not receiving SMS on Redmi/MI phones
Emergency number SMS not coming in Xiaomi
responses: For Redmi/MI phones: 1. Open ATMT Pro → Settings → Turn ON AUTOSTART. 2. Set Battery Saver to 'No restriction' for ATMT Pro. 3. Go to Other Permissions → Allow ALL permissions.
To prevent accessibility turning off: 1. Lock ATMT Pro in background (Redmi: Long-press ATMT Pro in recent apps → Lock). 2. This will keep accessibility from being disallowed automatically.

patterns: Sensor alert has no pin set
responses: If siren rings without pin: 1. Swipe away app from recents. 2. Reopen ATMT Pro. 3. Tap '+' → Sensor Activation → Set Pin. 4. Turn on sensor → Stop with new pin.
To unblock calls: Send 'ATMT UNBLOCK' as text message from your emergency number to the blocked number.
For exact location: 1. Update Google Maps. 2. Long-press map → Info → Storage → Clear Cache. 3. Map Settings → Clear All History.

patterns: Fix ATMT Pro SMS in Realme
responses: For Realme/Oppo: 1. Open Phone Manager → Privacy Permission → App Permission. 2. Enable: 'Read app notifications' and 'Read app usage access' for ATMT Pro.

patterns: Emergency number SMS issue in Samsung
responses: For Samsung: Go to Settings → Search 'Special Access' → 1. Enable 'Notifications access' for ATMT Pro 2. Enable 'Usage data access' for ATMT Pro.
For Vivo: Go to Settings → Privacy → 1. Enable 'Notification access' for ATMT Pro 2. Enable 'App with usage access' for ATMT Pro.
Yes, we can provide our company registration documents upon request. Please contact our support team for verified copies.
You'll need: GST certificate, PAN card, Aadhar card, Counter Address and Mail ID to begin the business process.
Yes, we continuously work on updates and new features for ATMT Pro mobile app to enhance user experience and security.
Yes, we can share our award certificates and event videos. Please contact our marketing department for these materials.
If you believe in technology-driven business solutions, you're on the right path. We lead the market with innovative products and have no direct competitors offering comparable solutions.
We work on population-based districts: Distributor (10 Lakh population), Minisuper (30 Lakh), Superstockiest (50 Lakh).
Our multi-channel strategy includes: Offline (Posters, Dangles, Banners), Dedicated sales managers (company-paid), Digital (TV ads, YouTube, WhatsApp/SMS campaigns, Facebook/Instagram marketing).
Minimum purchase: Distributorship (2000 codes), Minisuper (6000 codes), Superstockiest (10000 codes).
If your purchased codes don't sell, we'll provide alternate options and support to help move your inventory.

patterns: What is the price per code?
responses: Pricing including GST: Distributorship ₹135 per code, Super Stockiest ₹120 per code. These rates are inclusive of all taxes.
Our rates are non-negotiable for both Distributorship and Super Stockiest partnerships to maintain uniform pricing across all channels.
The standard sell price to retailers is ₹250 per code when you take Distributorship.

patterns: Can we sell directly to customers?
responses: Yes, as a Distributor or Super Stockiest, you're permitted to sell directly to end customers in addition to supplying retailers.

patterns: What if no distributor in area?
responses: As a Super Stockiest in a district without Distributors, you can onboard new Distributors yourself. We'll also provide you with qualified leads to help expand your network.
1 local Sales Manager will be: Recruited by you (knowing local market/language), Interviewed/Trained by us, and Salaried (₹15,000) by company. They'll work under both company and your direction.
You'll have full rights/ownership over your Marketing Executive. They'll follow both company guidelines and your local direction for optimal market penetration.
All partnerships have 1-year agreements with automatic renewal, ensuring continuous business operations without interruption.

patterns: Can I see the draft agreement?
responses: Yes, we can provide a draft copy of the agreement. Please share your email address so we can send the document for your review.
The company covers all renewal charges after completion of the agreement period - there are no additional fees for distributors/super stockiests.
Yes, agreements are executed on court-legal stamp paper. The company bears all stamp duty fees and associated legal charges.
We provide complete marketing kits including posters, banners and pamphlets in both Hindi and English languages at no additional cost.
Market surveys are optional but recommended. You may conduct your own assessment or consult our market analysts for territory insights.

patterns: Refund if I want to quit
responses: Agreements are non-refundable and binding. Early termination details are specified in the contract terms - please review Section 8 of the agreement.
The main challenge is continuously upgrading your marketing skills. We provide regular training and support to help you adapt to market changes.
All codes are dispatched from our Nagpur office with transportation costs fully covered by the company - no charges to distributors.

patterns: What if goods damaged in transit?
responses: The company assumes full responsibility for goods in transit. We cover all losses due to damage or natural calamities during transportation.
